title: H$_{2}$OT: Hierarchical Hourglass Tokenizer for Efficient Video Pose Transformers
summary: This paper introduces H$_{2}$OT, a hierarchical pruning-and-recovering framework for efficient transformer-based 3D human pose estimation from videos, addressing the high computational costs of video pose transformers.
usefulness_reason: Score 70 assigned because the paper directly addresses "video-based 3D human pose estimation" and "video pose transformers," which are inherently spatio-temporal in nature. The processing of video data explicitly involves both spatial and temporal dimensions.
